author: Ella Alexander
title: George Clooney speaks out about becoming a dad for the first time
text:
George Clooney has said he is "happy and excited" about becoming a father to twins this summer. He and his wife, Amal Clooney, announced the news earlier this month . The actor's mother, Nina Clooney, has confirmed that they are having a boy and a girl .
"We are really happy and really excited," he said on the French television show Rencontres de Cinéma . "It's going to be an adventure. We've sort of embraced it all… with arms wide open."
 He described how he told his friends over dinner – much to their amusement.
"It got really quiet," he said. "And they all just started making baby-crying noises and the whole table just busted up laughing."
By the time Clooney becomes a father, he'll be 56 – so he's taking inspiration from the French actor Jean-Paul Belmondo, who had a child with his second wife, Nathalie Tardivel, when he was 70.
